original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens flat at 328.00/10 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: /CONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened stable at 328.00/328.10 to the US dollar on Monday, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the All Share Price Index was up 0.66 percent at 10,791.
The S&P SL20 was up 1.11 percent at 3,080. Turnover was at 257 million, CSE data showed.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.90/14.00 percent from 13.90/14.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.00/15 percent from 14.05/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.20/30 percent from 14.15/25 percent. (Colombo/Dec4/2023)
